Title: Story for Steven
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Joseph D. Johnston, Jeff Liu, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Jackie Buscarino, Michaela Dietz, Susan Egan
Plot: Greg tells Steven about how he met Rose and how meeting Rose changed his universe.
